passives.name: Sneak Slash Extension
passives.desc:
Sneak Slash use +2

When using Sneak Slash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Brigand's Glove duration +1
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sneak Slash:
 • Sneak Slash becomes Sneak Slash+ (moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit [except during summoning]; cancels previously granted Genji Glove、 Miracle Shoes; self: 6 turns Genji Glove or Miracle Shoes; returns to Sneak Slash after use)

When using Mug:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Genji Glove、 Miracle Shoes duration +1

When using HP Attack+ (Genji Glove):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
passives.short_desc: Sneak Slash Extension: Boost to Sneak Slash

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Phoenix Ray Extension
passives.desc:
Phoenix Ray use +1

When using Phoenix Ray:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
passives.short_desc: Phoenix Ray Extension: Boost to Phoenix Ray

passives.name: Tenacity Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Tenacity Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Steal Item Extension
passives.desc: When using Steal Item:\n • Adds effect that adds reduced BRV to own BRV after reducing target's BRV to 1/2
passives.short_desc: Steal Item Extension: Boost to Steal Item

passive.name: Steal Item Growth
passive.desc: Steal Item use +1\n\nSteal Item effects granted duration +2
passive.short_desc: Steal Item Growth: Boost to Steal Item

passive.name: Sneak Attack Up Longer
passive.desc: Raises ATK by 10% for 6 turns when attacking enemy not targeting self
passive.short_desc: Sneak Attack Up Longer: Raises ATK

passive.name: Treasure-Hunting Skills
passive.desc: When using Sneak Slash、 Sneak Slash+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Brigand's Glove boost、 duration+
passive.short_desc: Treasure-Hunting Skills: Boost to Sneak Slash

passive.name: In Search of Legendary Treasure
passive.desc:
When using Phoenix Ray:
 • Grants party BRV based on own ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV damage boost
 • Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt (recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP)
passive.short_desc: In Search of Legendary Treasure: Boost to Phoenix Ray

passive.name: Blue Mirage
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Mirage Dive
passive.short_desc: Blue Mirage: May equip Mirage Dive

passives.name: Mighty Mirage Dive
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Mirage Dive
passives.short_desc: Mighty Mirage Dive: Increases BRV damage dealt with Mirage Dive

passives.name: Mirage Dive Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Mirage Dive
passives.short_desc: Mirage Dive Recast Up: Raises recast speed for Mirage Dive

passives.name: All Blue Mirage Break Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Assassin's Dagger (VI) or passive ability Blue Mirage:\n • Tremendously increases party's Break Bonus
passives.short_desc: All Blue Mirage Break Boost Up: Raises party's Break Bonus

passive.name: Blue Mirage Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Mirage Dive
passive.short_desc: Blue Mirage Extension: Boost to Mirage Dive

passives.name: Mirage Dive Buff Plus Advance Recast Up
passives.desc:
Slightly raises recast speed of Mirage Dive

When using Mirage Dive:
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Self: 6 turns Master's Scroll
passives.short_desc: Mirage Dive Buff Plus Advance Recast Up: Boost to Mirage Dive

passives.name: Mirage Dive Buff Starting
passives.desc: 6 turns Treasure Hunter、 Master's Scroll at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Mirage Dive Buff Starting: Treasure Hunter、 Master's Scroll at start of quest

passives.name: Blue Mirage Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Assassin's Dagger (VI)+ or passive ability Blue Mirage Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 largely raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Blue Mirage Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Mirage Dive BRV HP Hit Plus Force Spread Up
passives.desc: When using Mirage Dive:\n • 7-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack becomes 6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack + 6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Deals 20% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets
passives.short_desc: Mirage Dive BRV HP Hit Plus Force Spread Up: Boost to Mirage Dive
